MOVETO.description: Move to a position using the coordinates provided

ATSPEED_AUTO.description: Set the speed of the simulated message to a calculated speed the message using the previous and current message

ATSPEED_MANUAL.description: Set the speed of the simulated message to a fixed speed (decimal)

WITHHDOP.description: Set the HDOP value of the simulated message, should be a value between 0 and 1 (decimal)

WITHSATELLITES.description: Set the number of satellites of the simulated message, should be a value greater than 0 (integer)

WITHALTITUDE.description: Set the altitude of the simulated message, should be a value greater than 0 (decimal)

WITHPARAM.description: Set a raw param of the simulated message, receives two positional arguments: the param name and the param value (string, any)

WAIT.description: Wait for a given amount of minutes before sending the next message, receives one positional argument: the time to wait in minutes (integer)

ATDIRECTION_AUTO.description: Set the direction or bearing of the simulated message to a calculated direction the message using the previous and current message

ATDIRECTION_MANUAL.description: Set the direction or bearing of the simulated message to a fixed direction (decimal)
